message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth more than $100 to me, and I believe it could be valuable to you as well. Let's start with an offer of $150. Looking forward to your response!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate you valuing the product at $100, but I'm looking to spend a bit less. How about $125?  Let me know if you're open to that.
Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget and am willing to meet in the middle. My counteroffer is $137.50 for the product. I hope this works for you!
